question:
The Bal Basera project had been flagged off for child welfare. In that context, consider the following statements:
  1. The project is under the women and child welfare department.
  2. Crèches are to be set up at construction sites in line with this project.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The project is under the ministry of housing and urban affairs. It was flagged off with the support of CPWD/ central public works department. The project aims to ensure the welfare of children of construction workers. The Bal Basera was inaugurated at AIIMS, Rishikesh. Statement 2 is correct: A Bal Basera will accommodate 35 children. It is to be under the management of CPWD’s Officers’ Wives association (OWA). The scheme will include crèches at the construction site. The scheme will also involve health camps to improve the life of construction workers’ children.
